direct_enhancements.method_name: transformingMap(Map<K, V>, Transformer<? super K, ? extends K>, Transformer<? super V, ? extends V>)
direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods create a transformed map, but transformedMap transforms existing contents while transformingMap does not.
transformedSortedMap relies on transformMap to perform the actual transformation of the map contents.
Both methods use key transformers to transform keys, making transformKey a relevant dependency.
Both methods use value transformers to transform values, making transformValue a relevant dependency.
